document_data.name: The Book of the Coast
document_data.author: [[Mespert]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Book of the Coast''''' was a [[book]] penned by [[Mespert]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Tongues wag their ways on great adventures with ease. Feet oft find it harder to follow.''|Excerpt from ''The Book of the Coast''}}
document_data.History: This book of musings included Mespert's thoughts on [[adventurer]]s whose bark was worse than their bite. ''The Book of the Coast'' was published in the {{YearlinkName|1293}},{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
